alert.note: Alert for Eastern Essex; Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 12 at 11:21AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...Snow showers will impact portions of southeastern Clinton, east central Franklin and northeastern Essex Counties through NOON EST... At 1121 AM EST, snow showers were reported near Lake Placid, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds 25 mph or greater, and visibility less than a mile. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Gusty winds may blow around unsecured objects. Low visibility may pose a hazard to motorists. Locations impacted include... Wilmington, Elizabethtown, Keene, Au Sable Forks, Keeseville, Jay In Essex County, Black Brook, Lewis, Upper Jay, Ausable Chasm, Whallonsburg, Reber, Wadhams, Clintonville, Boquet, Deerhead, Harkness, North Jay and Ausable Forks.
info.instruction: Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
